newsitem.title: BANGLADESH: Dhaka stocks seen continuing bear run.
newsitem.headline: Dhaka stocks seen continuing bear run.

text.p: Share prices on the Dhaka Stock Exchange (DSE) are likely to remain depressed on Tuesday in continuing post-budget dull sentiment, brokers said.
"We are rather depressed following the announcement of the 1997/98 (July-June) budget on Thursday," said broker Sabbir Ahmed. "It has nothing to enthuse us," he said.
The DSE all-share price index slipped 24.86 points or 2.16 percent to 1,123.25 on turnover of 54.7 million taka on Monday.
